original_text: The king was very angry and he stood up. He left his wine and he went into the palace garden. Haman realized that the king wanted to destroy him. So he stayed with Queen Esther and he asked her to save his life.
korean_text: 왕이 노하여 일어나서 잔치 자리를 떠나 왕궁 후원으로 들어가니라 하만이 일어서서 왕후 에스더에게 생명을 구하니 이는 왕이 자기에게 벌을 내리기로 결심한 줄 앎이더라

sentences.original_text: and he went into the palace garden
that the king wanted to destroy him
So he stayed with Queen Esther
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 에스더 왕후와 함께 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he asked her to save his life
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자신의 생명을 구해달라고 그녀에게 요청했습니다
